edu.ucla.sspace.mains

Class RIWordsiMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.mains.GenericMain
      • edu.ucla.sspace.mains.GenericWordsiMain
        • edu.ucla.sspace.mains.RIWordsiMain

  • public class RIWordsiMain
extends GenericWordsiMain
    An executiable class for running Wordsi with a RandomIndexingContextGenerator.

    The core command line arguments are provided by GenericWordsiMain. This class takes in the following additional arguments:
    • Required:
        -l, --indexVectorLength=INT Specifies the length of index vectors
        • Optional:
            -p, --permFunction=CLASSNAME Specifies the permutation function to apply on index vectors. (Default: none).

        When using the --Save option, this class will save a mapping from strings to TernaryVectors. When using the --Load option, this class will load a mapping from strings to TernaryVectors from disk. This mapping may be a GeneratorMap or it may be a fixed Map. If --Save is not used, a GeneratorMap will be used for creating TernaryVectors.
    Author:
    Keith Stevens
    See Also:
    GenericWordsiMain, RandomIndexingContextGenerator
